```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(dlookr)
```

```{r}
mydata <- read_csv("covid.csv")
```


```{r}

pairs(data = mydata, ~ log(increaseRate) +(covid_death_rate) + log(population) + log(popChange))
pairs(data = mydata, ~increaseRate + covid_death_rate + population + popChange)
pairs(data = mydata, ~increaseRate + covid_death_rate + population + popChange)

ggpairs(data = mydata, columns = c(14:18,21))

pairs(data = mydata, ~ covid_death_rate + proTrump)

dlookr::plot_correlate(mydata[,c(5:20,21)])
```
